overview:
Nirmal Shah heads the delivery organization at TESCRA.

As its Vice President of Global Delivery, Mr. Shah holds the portfolio of all service delivery, project staffing, recruiting and HR. Mr. Shah manages deliveries for TESCRA’s customer engagements worldwide, including the US, Canada, Europe and Asia.

He is also responsible for managing various techology practice areas, growing new practices and finding ways to effectively turn each practice area into a profitable, self-sustaining business unit.
